divs: Sighting DetailsA flash of light much larger than any star. Lasted just a second. Then a few seconds later a smaller flash a few degrees lower toward the horizon. There was a large thin cloud where this took place. In partly cloudy skies.I have seen flashes before but never this large. I watch the skies often.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There was one other sighting in Aurora on or around August 28th 2013
Summary: A flash of light much larger than any star.
